label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_026
content:

### Events
- Post-walkthrough follow-ups: answered auditor questions on token retention and rotation cadence; provided additional log excerpts.
- Reduced MFA reset backlog by adding triage tag for device replacement vs enrollment failure; improved median response by 1 minute.
- Reviewed remaining open attestation items; sent manager reminders and flagged 6 nearing SLA breach.
- Validated audit worker scaling rollback; kept one extra worker to maintain p95 ingest lag near 10s.

### On Call
- On Call Shift: S. Haddad
- On Call Pages: 2
- On Call Tickets: 14
- On Call Status: Stable; follow-ups completed and staffing adjusted.
